smul_of:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem smul_of [mul_one_class G] (g : G) (r : k) : «expr • » r (of k G g) = single g r := by simp
#align smul_of smul_of
single_zero_mul_apply:
theorem single_zero_mul_apply [add_zero_class G] (f : add_monoid_algebra k G) (r : k) (x : G) :
    (single 0 r * f : add_monoid_algebra k G) x = r * f x :=
  f.single_mul_apply_aux r _ _ _ fun a => by rw [zero_add]
#align single_zero_mul_apply single_zero_mul_apply
single_pow:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
-- This should be a `@[simp]` lemma, but the simp_nf linter times out if we add this.
-- Probably the correct fix is to make a `[add_]monoid_algebra.single` with the correct type,
-- instead of relying on `finsupp.single`.
theorem single_pow [add_monoid G] {a : G} {b : k} :
    ∀ n : ℕ, (single a b ^ n : add_monoid_algebra k G) = single («expr • » n a) (b ^ n)
  | 0 => by
    simp only [pow_zero, zero_nsmul]
    rfl
  | n + 1 => by rw [pow_succ, pow_succ, single_pow n, single_mul_single, add_comm, add_nsmul, one_nsmul]
#align single_pow single_pow
single_one_mul_apply:
theorem single_one_mul_apply [mul_one_class G] (f : monoid_algebra k G) (r : k) (x : G) :
    (single 1 r * f) x = r * f x :=
  f.single_mul_apply_aux fun a => by rw [one_mul]
#align single_one_mul_apply single_one_mul_apply
single_one_comm:
theorem single_one_comm [CommSemiring k] [mul_one_class G] (r : k) (f : monoid_algebra k G) :
    single 1 r * f = f * single 1 r := by
  ext
  rw [single_one_mul_apply, mul_single_one_apply, mul_comm]
#align single_one_comm single_one_comm
single_mul_single:
theorem single_mul_single [Add G] {a₁ a₂ : G} {b₁ b₂ : k} :
    (single a₁ b₁ * single a₂ b₂ : add_monoid_algebra k G) = single (a₁ + a₂) (b₁ * b₂) :=
  @monoid_algebra.single_mul_single k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ _ _
#align single_mul_single single_mul_single
single_mul_apply_aux:
theorem single_mul_apply_aux [Add G] (f : add_monoid_algebra k G) (r : k) (x y z : G) (H : ∀ a, x + a = y ↔ a = z) :
    (single x r * f : add_monoid_algebra k G) y = r * f z :=
  @monoid_algebra.single_mul_apply_aux k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ _ _ _ H
#align single_mul_apply_aux single_mul_apply_aux
single_mul_apply:
theorem single_mul_apply [add_group G] (r : k) (x : G) (f : add_monoid_algebra k G) (y : G) :
    (single x r * f : add_monoid_algebra k G) y = r * f (-x + y) :=
  @monoid_algebra.single_mul_apply k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ _ _
#align single_mul_apply single_mul_apply
single_eq_algebra_map_mul_of:
theorem single_eq_algebra_map_mul_of [CommSemiring k] [monoid G] (a : G) (b : k) :
    single a b = algebra_map k (monoid_algebra k G) b * of k G a := by simp
#align single_eq_algebra_map_mul_of single_eq_algebra_map_mul_of
single_algebra_map_eq_algebra_map_mul_of:
theorem single_algebra_map_eq_algebra_map_mul_of {A : Type _} [CommSemiring k] [Semiring A] [algebra k A] [monoid G]
    (a : G) (b : k) : single a (algebra_map k A b) = algebra_map k (monoid_algebra A G) b * of A G a := by simp
#align single_algebra_map_eq_algebra_map_mul_of single_algebra_map_eq_algebra_map_mul_of
ring_hom_ext':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →* » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →* » -/
/-- If two ring homomorphisms from `add_monoid_algebra k G` are equal on all `single a 1`
and `single 0 b`, then they are equal.

See note [partially-applied ext lemmas]. -/
@[ext]
theorem ring_hom_ext' {R} [Semiring k] [add_monoid G] [Semiring R] {f g : «expr →+* » (add_monoid_algebra k G) R}
    (h₁ : f.comp single_zero_ring_hom = g.comp single_zero_ring_hom)
    (h_of :
      (f : «expr →* » (add_monoid_algebra k G) R).comp (of k G) =
        (g : «expr →* » (add_monoid_algebra k G) R).comp (of k G)) :
    f = g :=
  ring_hom_ext (RingHom.congr_fun h₁) (MonoidHom.congr_fun h_of)
#align ring_hom_ext' ring_hom_ext'
ring_hom_ext:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
/-- If two ring homomorphisms from `add_monoid_algebra k G` are equal on all `single a 1`
and `single 0 b`, then they are equal. -/
theorem ring_hom_ext {R} [Semiring k] [add_monoid G] [Semiring R] {f g : «expr →+* » (add_monoid_algebra k G) R}
    (h₀ : ∀ b, f (single 0 b) = g (single 0 b)) (h_of : ∀ a, f (single a 1) = g (single a 1)) : f = g :=
  @monoid_algebra.ring_hom_ext k (Multiplicative G) R _ _ _ _ _ h₀ h_of
#align ring_hom_ext ring_hom_ext
prod_single:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod -/
theorem prod_single [CommSemiring k] [add_comm_monoid G] {s : Finset ι} {a : ι → G} {b : ι → k} :
    finset.prod "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod" s
        (single (a i) (b i)) =
      single (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (a i))
        (finset.prod "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.prod" s (b i)) :=
  Finset.cons_induction_on s rfl fun a s has ih => by
    rw [prod_cons has, ih, single_mul_single, sum_cons has, prod_cons has]

op_ring_equiv_symm_single:

@[simp]
theorem op_ring_equiv_symm_single [add_comm_monoid G] (r : «expr ᵐᵒᵖ» k) (x : «expr ᵐᵒᵖ» G) :
    add_monoid_algebra.op_ring_equiv.symm (single x r) = op (single x r.unop) := by simp

op_ring_equiv_single:

theorem op_ring_equiv_single [add_comm_monoid G] (r : k) (x : G) :
    add_monoid_algebra.op_ring_equiv (op (single x r)) = single x (op r) := by simp
#align op_ring_equiv_single op_ring_equiv_single
one_def:
theorem one_def : (1 : add_monoid_algebra k G) = single 0 1 :=
  rfl
#align one_def one_def
of_injective:
theorem of_injective [nontrivial k] [add_zero_class G] : function.injective (of k G) := fun a b h => by
  simpa using (single_eq_single_iff _ _ _ _).mp h
#align of_injective of_injective
of_apply:
@[simp]
theorem of_apply [add_zero_class G] (a : Multiplicative G) : of k G a = single a.to_add 1 :=
  rfl
#align of_apply of_apply
of'_eq_of:
theorem of'_eq_of [add_zero_class G] (a : G) : of' k G a = of k G a :=
  rfl
#align of'_eq_of of'_eq_of
of'_apply:
@[simp]
theorem of'_apply (a : G) : of' k G a = single a 1 :=
  rfl
#align of'_apply of'_apply
non_unital_alg_hom_ext':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₙₐ[ ] » -/
/-- See note [partially-applied ext lemmas]. -/
@[ext]
theorem non_unital_alg_hom_ext' [DistribMulAction k A] {φ₁ φ₂ : «expr →ₙₐ[ ] » (add_monoid_algebra k G) k A}
    (h : φ₁.to_mul_hom.comp (of_magma k G) = φ₂.to_mul_hom.comp (of_magma k G)) : φ₁ = φ₂ :=
  @monoid_algebra.non_unital_alg_hom_ext' k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ _ φ₁ φ₂ h
#align non_unital_alg_hom_ext' non_unital_alg_hom_ext'
non_unital_alg_hom_ext:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₙₐ[ ] » -/
/-- A non_unital `k`-algebra homomorphism from `add_monoid_algebra k G` is uniquely defined by its
values on the functions `single a 1`. -/
theorem non_unital_alg_hom_ext [DistribMulAction k A] {φ₁ φ₂ : «expr →ₙₐ[ ] » (add_monoid_algebra k G) k A}
    (h : ∀ x, φ₁ (single x 1) = φ₂ (single x 1)) : φ₁ = φ₂ :=
  @monoid_algebra.non_unital_alg_hom_ext k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ _ φ₁ φ₂ h
#align non_unital_alg_hom_ext non_unital_alg_hom_ext
nat_cast_def:
theorem nat_cast_def (n : ℕ) : (n : add_monoid_algebra k G) = single 0 n :=
  rfl
#align nat_cast_def nat_cast_def
mul_single_zero_apply:
theorem mul_single_zero_apply [add_zero_class G] (f : add_monoid_algebra k G) (r : k) (x : G) :
    (f * single 0 r) x = f x * r :=
  f.mul_single_apply_aux r _ _ _ fun a => by rw [add_zero]
#align mul_single_zero_apply mul_single_zero_apply
mul_single_one_apply:
theorem mul_single_one_apply [mul_one_class G] (f : monoid_algebra k G) (r : k) (x : G) :
    (f * single 1 r) x = f x * r :=
  f.mul_single_apply_aux fun a => by rw [mul_one]
#align mul_single_one_apply mul_single_one_apply
mul_single_apply_aux:
theorem mul_single_apply_aux [Add G] (f : add_monoid_algebra k G) (r : k) (x y z : G) (H : ∀ a, a + x = z ↔ a = y) :
    (f * single x r) z = f y * r :=
  @monoid_algebra.mul_single_apply_aux k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ _ _ _ H
#align mul_single_apply_aux mul_single_apply_aux
mul_single_apply:
theorem mul_single_apply [add_group G] (f : add_monoid_algebra k G) (r : k) (x y : G) :
    (f * single x r) y = f (y - x) * r :=
  (sub_eq_add_neg y x).symm ▸ @monoid_algebra.mul_single_apply k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ _ _
#align mul_single_apply mul_single_apply
mul_def:
theorem mul_def {f g : add_monoid_algebra k G} :
    f * g = f.sum fun a₁ b₁ => g.sum fun a₂ b₂ => single (a₁ + a₂) (b₁ * b₂) :=
  rfl
#align mul_def mul_def
mul_apply_right:
-- If we'd assumed `comm_semiring`, we could deduce this from `mul_apply_left`.
theorem mul_apply_right (f g : monoid_algebra k G) (x : G) : (f * g) x = g.sum fun a b => f (x * a⁻¹) * b :=
  calc
    (f * g) x = sum g fun a b => (f * single a b) x := by rw [← finsupp.sum_apply, ← finsupp.mul_sum, g.sum_single]
    _ = _ := by simp only [mul_single_apply, finsupp.sum]
    
#align mul_apply_right mul_apply_right
mul_apply_left:
theorem mul_apply_left (f g : monoid_algebra k G) (x : G) : (f * g) x = f.sum fun a b => b * g (a⁻¹ * x) :=
  calc
    (f * g) x = sum f fun a b => (single a b * g) x := by rw [← finsupp.sum_apply, ← finsupp.sum_mul, f.sum_single]
    _ = _ := by simp only [single_mul_apply, finsupp.sum]
    
#align mul_apply_left mul_apply_left
mul_apply_antidiagonal:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem mul_apply_antidiagonal [Add G] (f g : add_monoid_algebra k G) (x : G) (s : Finset (G × G))
    (hs : ∀ {p : G × G}, p ∈ s ↔ p.1 + p.2 = x) :
    (f * g) x =
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s
        (f p.1 * g p.2) :=
  @monoid_algebra.mul_apply_antidiagonal k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ _ s @hs
#align mul_apply_antidiagonal mul_apply_antidiagonal
mul_apply:
theorem mul_apply [decidable_eq G] [Add G] (f g : add_monoid_algebra k G) (x : G) :
    (f * g) x = f.sum fun a₁ b₁ => g.sum fun a₂ b₂ => if a₁ + a₂ = x then b₁ * b₂ else 0 :=
  @monoid_algebra.mul_apply k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ _ _
#align mul_apply mul_apply
map_domain_one:
/-- Like `finsupp.map_domain_zero`, but for the `1` we define in this file -/
@[simp]
theorem map_domain_one {α : Type _} {β : Type _} {α₂ : Type _} [Semiring β] [Zero α] [Zero α₂] {F : Type _}
    [ZeroHomClass F α α₂] (f : F) :
    (map_domain f (1 : add_monoid_algebra β α) : add_monoid_algebra β α₂) = (1 : add_monoid_algebra β α₂) := by
  simp_rw [one_def, map_domain_single, map_zero]
#align map_domain_one map_domain_one
map_domain_mul:
/-- Like `finsupp.map_domain_add`, but for the convolutive multiplication we define in this file -/
theorem map_domain_mul {α : Type _} {β : Type _} {α₂ : Type _} [Semiring β] [Add α] [Add α₂] {F : Type _}
    [AddHomClass F α α₂] (f : F) (x y : add_monoid_algebra β α) :
    (map_domain f (x * y : add_monoid_algebra β α) : add_monoid_algebra β α₂) =
      (map_domain f x * map_domain f y : add_monoid_algebra β α₂) :=
  by
  simp_rw [mul_def, map_domain_sum, map_domain_single, map_add]
  rw [finsupp.sum_map_domain_index]
  · congr
    ext (a b)
    rw [finsupp.sum_map_domain_index]
    · simp
    · simp [mul_add]
  · simp
  · simp [add_mul]
#align map_domain_mul map_domain_mul
map_domain_algebra_map:
theorem map_domain_algebra_map {A H F : Type _} [CommSemiring k] [Semiring A] [algebra k A] [add_monoid G]
    [add_monoid H] [AddMonoidHomClass F G H] (f : F) (r : k) :
    map_domain f (algebra_map k (add_monoid_algebra A G) r) = algebra_map k (add_monoid_algebra A H) r := by
  simp only [Function.comp_apply, map_domain_single, add_monoid_algebra.coe_algebra_map, map_zero]
#align map_domain_algebra_map map_domain_algebra_map

@[simp]
theorem group_smul.linear_map_apply [monoid G] [CommSemiring k] (V : Type u₃) [add_comm_monoid V] [Module k V]
    [Module (monoid_algebra k G) V] [IsScalarTower k (monoid_algebra k G) V] (g : G) (v : V) :
    (group_smul.linear_map k V g) v = («expr • » (single g (1 : k)) v : V) :=
  rfl
#align group_smul.linear_map_apply group_smul.linear_map_apply
lift_unique':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →* » -/
theorem lift_unique' (F : «expr →ₐ[ ] » (add_monoid_algebra k G) k A) :
    F = lift k G A ((F : «expr →* » (add_monoid_algebra k G) A).comp (of k G)) :=
  ((lift k G A).apply_symm_apply F).symm
#align lift_unique' lift_unique'
lift_unique:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- Decomposition of a `k`-algebra homomorphism from `monoid_algebra k G` by
its values on `F (single a 1)`. -/
theorem lift_unique (F : «expr →ₐ[ ] » (add_monoid_algebra k G) k A) (f : monoid_algebra k G) :
    F f = f.sum fun a b => «expr • » b (F (single a 1)) := by
  conv_lhs =>
    rw [lift_unique' F]
    simp [lift_apply]
#align lift_unique lift_unique
lift_symm_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
@[simp]
theorem lift_symm_apply (F : «expr →ₐ[ ] » (add_monoid_algebra k G) k A) (x : Multiplicative G) :
    (lift k G A).symm F x = F (single x.to_add 1) :=
  rfl
#align lift_symm_apply lift_symm_apply
lift_single:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →* » -/

@[simp]
theorem lift_single (F : «expr →* » (Multiplicative G) A) (a b) :
    lift k G A F (single a b) = «expr • » b (F (Multiplicative.ofAdd a)) := by
  rw [lift_def, lift_nc_single, algebra.smul_def, [anonymous]]

lift_of:

  rw [of_apply, ← lift_symm_apply, equiv.symm_apply_apply]

lift_nc_smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →* » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+ » -/
theorem lift_nc_smul {R : Type _} [add_zero_class G] [Semiring R] (f : «expr →+* » k R)
    (g : «expr →* » (Multiplicative G) R) (c : k) (φ : monoid_algebra k G) :
    lift_nc (f : «expr →+ » k R) g («expr • » c φ) = f c * lift_nc (f : «expr →+ » k R) g φ :=

lift_nc_single:

@[simp]
theorem lift_nc_single (f : «expr →+ » k R) (g : Multiplicative G → R) (a : G) (b : k) :
    lift_nc f g (single a b) = f b * g (Multiplicative.ofAdd a) :=
  lift_add_hom_apply_single _ _ _
#align lift_nc_single lift_nc_single
lift_nc_one:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/

theorem lift_nc_one {g_hom : Type _} [OneHomClass g_hom (Multiplicative G) R] (f : «expr →+* » k R) (g : g_hom) :
    lift_nc (f : «expr →+ » k R) g 1 = 1 :=

#align lift_nc_one lift_nc_one
lift_nc_mul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+ » -/
theorem lift_nc_mul {g_hom : Type _} [MulHomClass g_hom (Multiplicative G) R] (f : «expr →+* » k R) (g : g_hom)
    (a b : add_monoid_algebra k G) (h_comm : ∀ {x y}, y ∈ a.support → Commute (f (b x)) (g <| Multiplicative.ofAdd y)) :
    lift_nc (f : «expr →+ » k R) g (a * b) = lift_nc (f : «expr →+ » k R) g a * lift_nc (f : «expr →+ » k R) g b :=

theorem lift_def (F : «expr →* » (Multiplicative G) A) :
    «expr⇑ » (lift k G A F) = lift_nc ((algebra_map k A : «expr →+* » k A) : «expr →+ » k A) F :=

theorem lift_apply' (F : «expr →* » (Multiplicative G) A) (f : monoid_algebra k G) :
    lift k G A F f = f.sum fun a b => algebra_map k A b * F (Multiplicative.ofAdd a) :=

lift_apply:

#align lift_apply lift_apply
int_cast_def:
theorem int_cast_def [Ring k] [add_zero_class G] (z : ℤ) : (z : add_monoid_algebra k G) = single 0 z :=
  rfl
#align int_cast_def int_cast_def
induction_on:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem induction_on [add_monoid G] {p : add_monoid_algebra k G → Prop} (f : add_monoid_algebra k G)
    (hM : ∀ g, p (of k G (Multiplicative.ofAdd g))) (hadd : ∀ f g : add_monoid_algebra k G, p f → p g → p (f + g))
    (hsmul : ∀ (r : k) (f), p f → p («expr • » r f)) : p f :=
  by
  refine' finsupp.induction_linear f _ (fun f g hf hg => hadd f g hf hg) fun g r => _
  · simpa using hsmul 0 (of k G (Multiplicative.ofAdd 0)) (hM 0)
  · convert hsmul r (of k G (Multiplicative.ofAdd g)) (hM g)
    simp only [mul_one, toAdd_ofAdd, smul_single', of_apply]
#align induction_on induction_on
equivariant_of_linear_of_comm_apply:
@[simp]
theorem equivariant_of_linear_of_comm_apply (v : V) : (equivariant_of_linear_of_comm f h) v = f v :=
  rfl
#align equivariant_of_linear_of_comm_apply equivariant_of_linear_of_comm_apply
coe_algebra_map:
@[simp]
theorem coe_algebra_map [CommSemiring R] [Semiring k] [algebra R k] [add_monoid G] :
    (algebra_map R (add_monoid_algebra k G) : R → add_monoid_algebra k G) = single 0 ∘ algebra_map R k :=
  rfl
#align coe_algebra_map coe_algebra_map
alg_hom_ext_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
theorem alg_hom_ext_iff {φ₁ φ₂ : «expr →ₐ[ ] » (add_monoid_algebra k G) k A} :
    (∀ x, φ₁ (finsupp.single x 1) = φ₂ (finsupp.single x 1)) ↔ φ₁ = φ₂ :=
  ⟨fun h => alg_hom_ext h, by rintro rfl _ <;> rfl⟩
#align alg_hom_ext_iff alg_hom_ext_iff
alg_hom_ext':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →* » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →* » -/
/-- See note [partially-applied ext lemmas]. -/
@[ext]
theorem alg_hom_ext' ⦃φ₁ φ₂ : «expr →ₐ[ ] » (add_monoid_algebra k G) k A⦄
    (h :
      (φ₁ : «expr →* » (add_monoid_algebra k G) A).comp (of k G) =
        (φ₂ : «expr →* » (add_monoid_algebra k G) A).comp (of k G)) :
    φ₁ = φ₂ :=
  alg_hom_ext <| MonoidHom.congr_fun h
#align alg_hom_ext' alg_hom_ext'
alg_hom_ext:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/-- A `k`-algebra homomorphism from `monoid_algebra k G` is uniquely defined by its
values on the functions `single a 1`. -/
theorem alg_hom_ext ⦃φ₁ φ₂ : «expr →ₐ[ ] » (add_monoid_algebra k G) k A⦄ (h : ∀ x, φ₁ (single x 1) = φ₂ (single x 1)) :
    φ₁ = φ₂ :=
  @monoid_algebra.alg_hom_ext k (Multiplicative G) _ _ _ _ _ _ _ h
#align alg_hom_ext alg_hom_ext
